item.description:
The Early Ford V8 Club guys that we do the Wings and Wheels show with are holding their 42nd annual car show at the airport on April 22nd.

The car guys bring in thousands of people and it is a good opportunity to talk to the public and show them that airports, pilots, and airplanes are not their enemies.

This year, we have the added ability to make some money for the chapter. They have asked us to provide the food. We are working to setup a tent and sell some breakfast in the morning and some burgers in the afternoon.

Like previous years, I would also like to setup a table with our literature and park an airplane or two to show. It is a little less than two months before the June YE event and we usually get a lot of people picking up YE forms. I previously brought my airplane out for people to see and it was neat to watch them oogle it.

It would be great if I could get 15 or 20 people to help with the show. I need people to hang around the table and answer questions about aviation as well as help in the food area. I am also looking for a 1 or 2 airplanes.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: V8 Club Car Show
